name: ExtremeRoad
description:
I tested the whole route I did. Ideally, I would suggest a manual gearbox, giving you more flexibility in managing hills, but you can also work in "zigzag"

Credits :

Unreal Engine

Terrain generation : Houdini

Truck assets from : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/bbcb90a03f844edbb20c8b89e...

Raindrop texture coming from this tutorial : Rain Drops on Screen Effect - (UE4 Tutorial)

Sound samples : 

https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/401277/

https://freesound.org/people/Legnalegna55/sounds/530052/

https://freesound.org/people/bone666138/sounds/198837/

https://freesound.org/people/SoundLover16/sounds/511853/

https://freesound.org/people/willybilly1984/sounds/345336/

https://freesound.org/people/tim.kahn/sounds/22885/

Use of Brushify for terrain painting and road creation
